thread.title: Sifted USA Launches Online Store For Artisan and Locally Made Gifts
thread.title_full: Sifted USA Launches Online Store For Artisan and Locally Made Gifts - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Sifted USA Launches Online Store For Artisan and Locally Made Gifts
text:
Sifted USA is a new online gift store that offers a curated selection of high-quality, locally made gift items made exclusively in the United States. http://www.siftedusa.com
Greenville, SC (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Sifted USA is a new online retailer that offers a curated selection of high-quality artisan gifts made exclusively in the United States. By sifting through hundreds of products, we are able to offer our shoppers some of the best of the best items available for all occasions such as wedding, new baby, housewarming and more.
“We are so excited to announce the launch of Sifted USA” says Beth McPhee, Sifted USA’s Founder & President. “Everyone at Sifted loves shopping local and we are thrilled to be able to provide a one-stop shop for customers who share our passion for beautifully crafted products and love to shop local.”
Sifted USA currently offers more than 200 products from 30 different makers across the country. Each product was carefully selected to ensure that they fit into different gift-giving occasions such as housewarmings, weddings, baby showers and more. Artists currently offered on Sifted USA come from all over the country and include Debbie Bean Stained Glass, Evermore Living, Leandra Hill Metal Works, W&P Design and many more.
While providing customers a unique shopping experience, Sifted USA also will be providing insight into the process and inspiration from each of their brands through their monthly Artist Spotlight. “It’s important to tell the back story on these amazing artists. Customers today not only want to shop local, they want to know the story behind their purchase,” McPhee says.
While searching for many gifts over the past few years for birthdays, weddings, baby showers, etc, Beth McPhee always wished that there was a destination where she could find the best of the best in one place. Her passion for artisan made products and her love of scouring craft fairs and antique markets is what started the idea for Sifted USA. McPhee says “I wanted to create a place where customers can find something for everyone on their gift list. Whether it’s a wedding or a baby shower, you can find a gift on Sifted.” After a lot of brainstorming and sifting through all of her thoughts, Sifted USA finally launched in September of 2015.
For more information on Sifted USA and the brands that they offer, visit http://www.siftedusa.com
About Sifted USA
Sifted USA is a new online retailer that offers a curated selection of high-quality giftable items made exclusively in the United States. By sifting through hundreds of products, we are able to offer our shoppers the best artisan gifts available for all occasions such as wedding, new baby, housewarming and more! Based in the local-centric city of Greenville, South Carolina, Sifted looks forward to being able to bring local artists to a broader audience.
About Beth McPhee
Beth McPhee serves as the President of ETHACY LLC, current owner of Sifted USA and Momma’s Jewels. She has 15 years of experience in retail and marketing and has held positions at Zac Posen, Lacoste, Scoop NYC, and Colonial Candle. During her time in the retail industry she has developed a love for supporting her local community and makers all of over the country.
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/siftedusa/2015/prweb13023009.htm
